QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Immunoelectrophoresis - blood
QAPair.Answer: Serum immunoelectrophoresis is a lab test that measures proteins called immunoglobulins in the blood. Immunoglobulins are proteins that function as antibodies , which fight infection. There are many types of immunoglobulins that fight different types of infections. Some immunoglobulins can be abnormal and may be due to cancer. Immunoglobulins can also be measured in the urine .
